title: EdgeUp Platform
event: Final Project SISTECH by RISTEK Fasilkom UI 2025
description: A web-based career prediction platform developed with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS. Features include JSON-based recommendations and interactive career insights.

title: Think & Whack Game
event: Hands-On Task SISTECH by RISTEK Fasilkom UI 2025
description: An interactive web game built to test reaction speed and focus, using HTML, CSS, Javascript and engaging gameplay.

title: Quran App
event: Workshop React JS Al-Qur'an by Dunia Coding Academy 2025
description: A React-based application for reading and navigating the Al-Qur'an, with a user-friendly interface and responsive design.
